name: Fighting Frenzy
text: You feed off the rage of your allies.
benefit: When you are in a rage and an ally with this feat within 60 feet is in a rage, you don’t take the normal –2 penalty to AC for being in a rage. If you would take a larger penalty to AC for being in a rage, reduce that penalty by 2.
text_zh: 你与盟友一起陷入狂怒，投身不顾一切的恶斗。
benefit_zh: 每当你和一个距离你60尺内且拥有本专长的盟友同时进入狂暴状态，你不会因为狂暴而承受防御等级上的-2减值。如果你因为狂暴而承受高于2点防御等级减值，这个减值减少2点。
